assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare no competing interests.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The Institutional Review Board of the Children’s Hospital of Philadelphia approved this study. Informed consent was obtained from all individual participants included in the study. Families of individuals 2 &12 consented for publication of images.
